00084 namespace sinks

00088 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00089  * Classes
00090  */
00091 
00096 struct null_sink
00097 {
00098     size_t  numWrites;  
00099     size_t  numSlices;  
00100     size_t  cchTotal;   
00102 public: // Construction
00105     null_sink()
00106         : numWrites(0u)
00107         , numSlices(0u)
00108         , cchTotal(0u)
00109     {}
00110 };
00111 
00112 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00113  * Action Shims
00114  */
00115 
00120 inline null_sink&
00121   fmt_slices(
00122     null_sink&                  sink
00123 ,   int                         /* flags */
00124 ,   size_t                      cchTotal
00125 ,   size_t                      numResults
00126 ,   ff_string_slice_t const*    results
00127 )
00128 {
00129     if(NULL == results)
00130     {
00131         FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_PRECONDITION_PARAMS_INTERNAL(0u == cchTotal, "Cannot have non-zero size if the results array pointer is null");
00132         FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_PRECONDITION_PARAMS_INTERNAL(0u == numResults, "Cannot have non-zero array elements if the results array pointer is null");
00133     }
00134     else
00135     {
00136         ++sink.numWrites;
00137         sink.numSlices  +=  numResults;
00138         sink.cchTotal   +=  cchTotal;
00139     }
00140 
00141     return sink;
00142 }
00143

00151 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
